description:
Nuku Nuku buys the last fried noodle bun right out from under Chieko`s nose, and she vows revenge. The day after, at the sports festival, Chieko appears in power armor and challenges Nuku Nuku! Mishima employees Arisa and Kyouko try to defeat her with their giant robot, but Nuku Nuku won`t stand idly by.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Hashiru! Dai Undoukai, Aa Sou kai!
Nuku Nuku runs - The Big Field day, oh I get it
ヌクヌク走る! 大運動会, ああそうかい!
